languages.text: {n}Услышав суровое слово Вольного Торговца, большинство каторжан ужаснулись, опустили оружие и сдались. Самых непреклонных и зараженных смутьянскими мыслями перебили надзиратели.{/n}
{n}After hearing the stern words of the Rogue Trader, most of the convicts lowered their weapons and surrendered in horror. The overseers finished off the most rebellious and relentless.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Услышав суровое слово Вольного Торговца, большинство каторжан ужаснулись, опустили оружие и сдались. Самых непреклонных и зараженных смутьянскими мыслями перебили надзиратели.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}After hearing the stern words of the Rogue Trader, most of the convicts have lowered their weapons and surrendered in horror. The wardens have finished off the most rebellious and relentless convicts.{/n}

{n}After hearing the stern words of the Rogue Trader, most of the convicts have lowered their weapons and surrendered in horror. The wardens have finished off the most rebellious and relentless convicts.{/n}
{n}After hearing the stern words of the Rogue Trader, most of the convicts lowered their weapons and surrendered in horror. The wardens finished off the most rebellious and relentless convicts.{/n}
{n}After hearing the stern words of the Rogue Trader, most of the convicts lowered their weapons and surrendered in horror. The wardens finished off the most rebellious and relentless convicts.{/n}
{n}After hearing the stern words of the Rogue Trader, most of the convicts lowered their weapons and surrendered in horror. The overseers finished off the most rebellious and relentless.{/n}
{n}After hearing the stern words of the Rogue Trader, most of the convicts lowered their weapons and surrendered in horror. The overseers finished off the most rebellious and relentless.{/n}

languages.text: {n}听到行商浪人严厉的言辞后，绝大多数囚犯都放下武器，惊恐地投降了。在这之后，监察员处死了那些最为不可救药的叛乱分子。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After hearing the stern words of the Rogue Trader, most of the convicts lowered their weapons and surrendered in horror. The overseers finished off the most rebellious and relentless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到行商浪人严厉的言辞后，绝大多数囚犯都放下武器，惊恐地投降了。在这之后，监察员处死了那些最为不可救药的叛乱分子。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Después de escuchar las palabras severas {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, la mayoría de los convictos bajaron las armas y se rindieron, aterrorizados. Los supervisores acabaron con los reclusos más rebeldes e implacables.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After hearing the stern words of the Rogue Trader, most of the convicts lowered their weapons and surrendered in horror. The overseers finished off the most rebellious and relentless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Después de escuchar las palabras severas {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, la mayoría de los convictos bajaron las armas y se rindieron, aterrorizados. Los supervisores acabaron con los reclusos más rebeldes e implacables.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ローグトレーダーの厳しい言葉を聞いた受刑者たちは、そのほとんどが恐怖のあまり武器を下ろし、降伏した。看守たちが、最も反抗的で容赦のない受刑者たちを抹殺した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After hearing the stern words of the Rogue Trader, most of the convicts lowered their weapons and surrendered in horror. The overseers finished off the most rebellious and relentless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ローグトレーダーの厳しい言葉を聞いた受刑者たちは、そのほとんどが恐怖のあまり武器を下ろし、降伏した。看守たちが、最も反抗的で容赦のない受刑者たちを抹殺した。{/n}
{n}ローグトレーダーの厳しい言葉を聞いた受刑者たちは、そのほとんどが恐怖のあまり武器を下ろし、降伏した。看守たちが、最も反抗的で容赦のない受刑者たちを抹殺した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après avoir entendu les paroles {mf|du|de la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}, la plupart des détenus baissent leurs armes et se rendent, horrifiés. Les contremaîtres achèvent les plus rebelles et les plus acharnés d'entre eux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After hearing the stern words of the Rogue Trader, most of the convicts lowered their weapons and surrendered in horror. The overseers finished off the most rebellious and relentless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir entendu les paroles {mf|du|de la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}, la plupart des détenus baissent leurs armes et se rendent, horrifiés. Les contremaîtres achèvent les plus rebelles et les plus acharnés d'entre eux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nachdem sie die strengen Worte {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gehört hatten, senkten die meisten Sträflinge die Waffen und ergaben sich voller Entsetzen. Die Aufseher töteten die besonders rebellischen und beharrlichen Sträflinge.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After hearing the stern words of the Rogue Trader, most of the convicts lowered their weapons and surrendered in horror. The overseers finished off the most rebellious and relentless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem sie die strengen Worte {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gehört hatten, senkten die meisten Sträflinge die Waffen und ergaben sich voller Entsetzen. Die Aufseher töteten die besonders rebellischen und beharrlichen Sträflinge.{/n}

{n}Nachdem sie die strengen Worte {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gehört hatten, senkten die meisten Sträflinge die Waffen und ergaben sich voller Entsetzen. Die Wärter haben die rebellischsten und gnadenlosesten Sträflinge getötet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hür Tacir'in sert sözlerini duyan birçok mahkûm, silah bırakarak dehşet içinde teslim oldu. İsyana gönül verenlerin ve pes etmeyenlerin sonunuysa gözetmenler getirdi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After hearing the stern words of the Rogue Trader, most of the convicts lowered their weapons and surrendered in horror. The overseers finished off the most rebellious and relentless.{/n}
